original_title: President flies to Britain to attend Prince Charles coronation ceremony
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe left the Katunayake International Airport this morning for the United Kingdom to attend the coronation ceremony of Prince Charles, the airport officials confirmed.
The coronation will take place on May 6, 2023, at 11.00 am London time.
The President and the entourage will be on transit in Dubai, before taking a connecting flight to London. (T.K.G. Kapila)
